title: Enjoy the World of GTA Online With our Gift of GTA$500,000.
headline: Rockstar Alert
subtitle: It’s a big world, and it’s yours for the taking.
content:
As a loyal Grand Theft Auto Online player and member of the Rockstar Games Mailing list, we're rewarding you with a complimentary gift of GTA$500,000 to spend however you like. Just enter the world of GTA Online to find an additional GTA$500,000 waiting in your character’s bank account.

GTA$500,000 has been added to the GTA Online character’s bank account associated with this Rockstar Games Social Club profile.
